item.title: Writing an IBM i Syntax Highlighter for VS Code
item.description: Migrated post from DEV.to Introduction I love VS Code and really want it to be the “all in one” editor. Unfortunately, there are still plenty of fringe cases that just don’t work yet. To make a long stort short, I recently started working as an IBMi developer. Its a midrange system (the middle ground between standard server and mainframe) that uses an old programming language called RPG (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IBM_RPG, the same era as COBOL and FORTRAN).
